name: Parsnip in debt
description:
Parsnips arent exactly fit for most jobs, therefore this one is in crippling debt and has 60 seconds to pay it before he gets evicted.

Play as a parsnip to collect as much gold as humanly possible in the time limit and also collect clocks which will either add or remove 10 seconds to the time

if you reach the end of the stage you get some bonus gold

to pay your debts you only need 40 out of 65 of the coins in the level (bonus included)

sounds from https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style

music from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/downloads-c/8-bit-music/6
